title: Lake Chelan National Recreation Area: Accommodations
body: Accommodations       Stehekin Landing Resort (509) 682-4494 www.stehekinlanding.com Silver Bay Resort at Stehekin (800) 555-7781 www.silverbayinn.com Stehekin Rainbow Lodge (206) 219-7512 Stehekin Valley Ranch (800) 536-0745 www.stehekinvalleyranch.com  or visit the Courtney Log Office at the Stehekin Landing. Individual cabins available for rent by private owners. Locations vary from one to six miles from the Stehekin Landing. • Cascade Corral's Log Cabins (509) 682-7742 courtneystehekin@msn.com • Stehekin Mountain Cabin pittscabin@hughes.net
